channel.title: STO:PNDXB on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in STO:PNDXB on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Pandox Consortium Makes €1.4 Billion Offer for Dalata Hotel
item.description: A consortium including Pandox AB and Eiendomsspar AS has made a firm €1.4 billion ($1.6 billion) offer for Dalata Hotel Group Plc, which the board of Dalata intends to recommend unanimously.

item.title: Pandox Consortium Makes €1.4 Billion Offer for Dalata Hotel
item.description: A consortium including Pandox AB and Eiendomsspar AS has made a firm €1.4 billion ($1.6 billion) offer for Dalata Hotel Group Plc, which the board of Dalata intends to recommend unanimously.
